name: Point Blank (itch) (JungaBoon)
description:
Hyaluron Robotics.

Maker of the highly-advanced Automated Intelligence System series of robots. Used in many labor-intensive industries and homes around the globe. Millions shipped worldwide.

Two days ago, a critical bug was discovered. It's been radio silence since. As the cleanup crew, you're tasked with stopping these defective machines from escaping or die trying.
